handle

protected def handle(Map m, String route, HttpMethod method)
Handle all routes.
Parameters:
m - a map containing the forward or redirect location, as well as potential validation rules for the variables appearing in the route, a definition of a caching duration, and the ability to ignore certain paths like GAE's /_ah/* special URLs.
